attributes.action: Stop ALL Illegal Immigration into the U.K and leave the ECHR.
attributes.additional_details: Not enough action is currently being taken, the government are slow acting and must resolve this issue much faster to stop the growing threat.
attributes.background: The People of the U.K want a stop to illegal Migration, costing tax-payer money and putting the rightful people of the U.K in danger.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about illegal migration, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Withdraw from the European Convention on Human Rights: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651067

Stop legal aid for people who entered the UK illegally: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642417

Send all asylum seekers to a third country or their home country: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640388

If you want the Government to do something different to the above you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
